ILights user_data Enter Email Enter Password Enter Name Re-Enter Password Forgot password? Log In OR Sign in with Google Required* Error Retry Copied BoardId to ClipBoard \u0020 Exit Please Wait…… Verifying User Data…… Deleting User Erasing user data from database Login Failed Signup Failed Agree prev next Disagree Analytics Consent We\'ll use Firebase Analytics to record events when you interact with the app to improve user experience.\nWe don\'t use your personal data and only in-app events are captured for analytics.\n\nYou can change your choice later in the app settings. Loading… Blocked Change name Enter new name Update RESTART An update has just been downloaded. Failed to update app. Update was unsuccessful.\n Try again to continue. App update Successful. Email verified Email not verified. Tap to verify Verification Email was sent. Check Your Email inbox and verify Verification Email was not sent. Try Again Email is already verified Verification Email was sent. Login Again Your Access is blocked.\n Ask any Admin to unblock Update Available Empty search text Same as Previous Unknown Error Occurred Mandatory Update This update is necessary for the functionality of the application.\nUpdate to continue using the app. REGISTER SIGN IN Already registered? version: %1$s Hello blank fragment Sign In Signing in.... Signing up.... send Please check your internet connection and try again Email sent successfully Failed to send email An email with password reset link will be sent to the entered email address. Click the link to reset your password then come back again and login with your new password.\nThank You! Register Sign Up By clicking SIGN IN/REGISTER, you agree to the User agreement and Privacy Policy. Link to Privacy Policy OK Cancel Title Passwords don\'t match SettingsActivity Enter full email Enter full name Failed to fetch data No users exists with this %1$s Successfully modified user access Failed to modify user access Current Level: %1$s Change Access BLOCK USER ADMIN DEVELOPER Add Pin Pin Configuration %1$d %1$s Pins Pin Pin name Pin number %1$d All pins are in use. Successfully updated name of Pin %1$d Failed to update pin name Successfully added Pin %1$d Failed to add pin Successfully deleted Pin %1$d Failed to delete pin Deleting Pin %1$d will remove from board. Are you sure ? Delete Add Back Don\'t show again Cancel Change Press back button again to exit. Network error\nYour network might be very slow or you are not connected to internet This will delete your account and data associated with it.\nClick Yes to proceed Change Password Re-Authentication %1$s Success Failed Re-Authenticated Re-Authenticate This setting will take effect from next app launch. Password Updated Successfully Failed to update Password This operation is very sensitive.\nYou must re-authenticate yourself to continue Deleting your Account will remove all user data from database.\This is a destructive action so in order to use the app you must sign in again Confirm Action Are you sure to log out ? Yes No Controller Board is %1$s Failed to update data %5$s\nPin Configuration %1$d\n\nSwitched %2$s by %3$s\nat %4$s Boards edit Add Board Creating Board Created new Board %1$s. Creating Authentication… Writing Board Data.... Failed to add board Failed to retrieve data. Check your internet connection. %1$s\n\nCreated By: %2$s \nCreator Email: %3$s \nCreated On: %4$s BoardID: %1$s UID : GvjyhTVytGTVbyuVYJVcfgyvCGF Enter details Enter name… Pick a name for the board Enter description… Describe briefly the use of this board Select Visibility PUBLIC PRIVATE If visibility is \"PUBLIC\" then this board will be visible to everyone in the app else it will only be visible to people you will choose.\nIn either case, users will need permission before they get access to the board. Select Pin Choose Board All Boards come with a lot of pins but not all of them are to be used because not all GPIOs are exposed to normal use, some GPIOs are not recommended to use and others have very specific functions. So, choose pins in this page wisely or you board might misbehave.\nFor ex: The ESP8266 board comes with 17 GPIO pins but only pins 2, 4, 5, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17 are safe to use. No. of Pins Select pins to be used from below grid by touching or sliding over cells. You have not selected any Pin from the square grid.\nSelect pins to be used from below grid by touching or sliding over cells. ESP8266 ESP32 Other 17 48 Add Credentials The credentials here will be used to establish communication with the board. Choose a username and a strong Password. Username Password @brd.in Verifying credentials Review Basic details Pins Credentials name description visibility board total pins username password Create Board ID: %1$s Copy Board ID Edit Details Show Credentials Add Users Add Members Edit Users Request Editor Level Access Delete Board Leave Board Go to Switches Approve Requests Request access… Already requested Load more… Random Text Access Level: %1$s name updated successfully! failed to update name! setting button Display Theme Battery Saver Mode Automatically switch to dark theme when battery saver is active. Only works when theme used is "Follow System". Change Name Verify Email Sign Out Delete Account Choose a filter email name time About Profile Admin Privacy Version Update Available A new update with version code %1$d is available.\nTap to update. Search Users Manage Users Edit Board Privacy Policy Send Statistics Automatically send usage statistics to help us improve the user experience and application. Get access to more boards Title Access Level Owner BoardOptions Remove Promote to Editor Demote to User Promoting user will give him EDITOR level access. Demoting user will remove his EDITOR level access. Deleting user will remove him from this board. Details updated. Failed to update details. Failed to get credentials Use this username and password to connect the board to perform the network operations like reading the switch states and sending data from the board.\n\n%1$s Action search Status Settings Search users by their names Add users as Editor Search text must be at least %1$d words Members More Boards Notifications Requests Accept Reject Successfully added users to board Adding Users Add as USER Add as EDITOR Already a member The operation had to be aborted due to a network disconnect Too many retries The operation could not be performed due to a network error. This client does not have permission to perform this operation The service is unavailable An unknown error occurred. Notification Icon Failed to Load Data Load older notifications Load You have access to no boards. Go to More Boards to add Board Home Apply Clear Filter Filter based on following fields:
  • Owner\'s name: Enter at least first 4 letters of the name to search.
  • Owner\'s email: Enter at least first 4 letters of the email to search.
  • Time: Pick Ascending or Descending order to search.
Select Owner\'s name Owner\'s email Creation time Ascending Descending User Editor No field chosen Type something to search pick an order must be more than 3 characters Something went wrong No data found for following filter parameters Failed to Request Access Add Switch Off On No switches in board. Add a switch by clicking the plus button below Pick a name for this pin Brief description of this pin Done Edit Pin Add Pin You don\'t have required permissions to add/edit pins. Request a higher level access from board owner from BOARDS menu. OK Deleting board Mark all as seen Reset Database Clear offline database Board data Contains various board related data which do not changes frequently like the creation and owner details.\nTap to clear. Notification data Older notifications data are stored in the database\nTap to clear. Are you sure to clear offline $1%s data ? Board data deleted Notification data deleted Appearance Pick a color This setting will take effect from next app launch
